name: Fantastic 4
summary: The Fantastic Four game for the Game Boy Advance (GBA), released in 2005, is a port of the main console version and was developed to correspond with the film's release. It features an action-oriented gameplay format utilising an isometric perspective. Players control the four members of the Fantastic Four, each equipped with unique abilities, to progress through levels that are thematically based on the movie's plot. The game integrates combat, puzzle-solving, and exploration, allowing players to use the distinct powers of each character to overcome obstacles and enemies.
